desc: Here at Rixen’s, our name is our promise. All our products are hand assembled and tested by our local team in Sandy, Oregon. For over 35 years our mission has been to deliver reliable, well-designed systems, keeping our customers warm and comfortable all over the globe.

layout.text: When it comes to heating Class A motorhomes, no one does it better than Rixen’s. We offer a full line of heating systems with many different options.
